docs.snippet: The shows are a reminder that violence is an everyday reality for many people, that it is less freakish than banal.

headline.print_headline: I Survived Domestic Violence. Now I’m Drawn to True Crime Podcasts.

docs.snippet: This proudly diverse and tolerant city is now confronted with the tensions and ugliness that have been simmering on the fringes for years and are boiling to the surface.

docs.snippet: Somalis welcomed Officer Mohamed Noor to his precinct last year, but they’re now grappling with his having fatally shot an Australian woman who had called 911.
